verbs.description: [ARG1: The question now] [V: is] [ARG2: whether AT&T ’s payments to President Trump 's attorney Michael Cohen were an attempt to influence Trump ’s views on AT&T 's deal to combine with Time Warner deal or were payment for research on a new and idiosyncratic administration] .

The question now is whether [ARG1: AT&T ’s payments to President Trump 's attorney Michael Cohen] [V: were] [ARG2: an attempt to influence Trump ’s views on AT&T 's deal to combine with Time Warner deal or were payment for research on a new and idiosyncratic administration] .

The question now is whether AT&T ’s payments to President Trump 's attorney Michael Cohen were an attempt to influence Trump ’s views on AT&T 's deal to [V: combine] [ARG2: with Time Warner deal] or were payment for research on a new and idiosyncratic administration .

The question now is whether [ARG1: AT&T ’s payments to President Trump 's attorney Michael Cohen] were an attempt to influence Trump ’s views on AT&T 's deal to combine with Time Warner deal or [V: were] [ARG2: payment for research on a new and idiosyncratic administration] .
